Producer: Jana Edelbaum, Rachel Cohen, Pamela Koffler, Christine Vachon
Synopsis: Frantically managing two kids, an absent-minded husband and her ambitions to become a writer, Eliza Welsh wonders if she's sacrificed too much for her family. With her daughter's sixth birthday approaching, arranging the party brings a whole new set of challenges, as everything conspires to turn her arrangements on their head.
Title: Motherhood
